posts.post_content:
Finally have these all priced, shipping included - a few SGC need to be scanned still.  Feel free to make offers on any.  Payment accepted via Paypal gift, check or money order - shipping is quick and safe.

New HOF'ers added, as follows, scans available on the following page: [URL="http://t206themonster.com/T205-Cards.html"]T205's for Sale[/URL]

Baker SGC 40 - $145
Bender SGC 30 - $85
Bresnahan (closed) SGC 40 - $115
Mordecai Brown SGC 40 - $115
Cicotte SGC 20 - $60
Duffy SGC 40 - $110
Evers SGC 30 - $75
Griffith SGC 30 - $70
My apologies - there were quite a few errors, as I tried to get more scans up tonight than I had time to do.  Everything should be up-to-date now.

Thanks for the wicked fast service, the totally rad cards that look better in person and the opportunity to upgrade a couple of my beloved T205's, Scott.

:D
Thanks, Brian - my pleasure.  It's a lot more enjoyable doing deal with board member and getting to know some of you better.
The 10% off deal is good for my T205s and T206s as well...and M101-2's

I still have a lot of VG and VGEX PSA-slabbed commons for sale.  I can go way down on most of these - the PSA 4 commons that are marked $50 are available now for $40 (ignore website prices).

The PSA 3, 4.5, and 5 will also be lower - if you see any you are interested in, just email me for a bottom-line price, but they will be lower than going ebay prices, saving me fees and giving you a discount at the same time.

Thanks.

Scott,

Card arrived promptly.  Thanks for the good deal.

Dave
